content: Best puzzles
Nice puzzles, well selected. Must have

Excellent training for chess players. I wish there was a little more explanation about the various types of game for the less informed. Some of the so called "best" moves only become apparent if you play the next 20 moves...so, in fact, are not really the best move but a move that initiates, at 20 moves distance, checkmate. After two games, the daily puzzle failed to show up.. ..not seen it since. Nevertheless, a very nice chess app.
Good puzzles but I would like to be able to turn off the showing of hint ("simplification" or "difficult") on the daily puzzles.
replyContent: Noted, will do that! Thanks Josh

content: I bought over 20 puzzles, not that i can't get puzzles for free but this layout is great. Nice accompaniment with analyze this. YOU NEED MORE PUZZLES PLEASE.
Minimal animation, minimal effort. Very basic.

content: Best tactics training app available. Thanks to the developers. Just now purchased the "Endgame Tactics". Three cheers & Five stars from a Chess enthusiast. Please help: can't reset my scores.

content: Thanks for the quick fix. I was experiencing withdrawal.

content:
Awesome . Best chess puzzle programs. User friendly. Can load up to 20,000 
tactical problems. Outstanding and 5 stars

Nice puzzles, decent layout. Don't love the colors, but it's a great app. I love that you let me pay a fair price for the app instead of subjecting me to awful adds. I really appreciate the work you did on this one!
replyContent: Thanks Ethan for your kind feedback! Cheers, Asim

content: No comment pls.....?
Wide range of positions from games of varying standards with a nice interface.
replyContent:
For a moment I thought wooah.. does the App have lots of problems/bugs!? Then I realized..lol problems = chess problems/puzzles!
Thank you! :-)

content: Missed the "based on game result" option for which side to move in your own PGNs. Could you bring that back? That was useful for me. Thank you.
replyContent: Sure, will add back! Does your PGN have a mix of puzzles where either its the 1st side or the 2nd side to move?

content: Quite impressive.  Although I am a novice, I truly appreciate the incredible amount of research and work that Asim has put into this app, and continues to do so.  The app is of top noch quality; it is very fast with just the right amount of customizable graphics.  The focus is on learning and playing chess. Thank you for continuously improving the app.  Highly recommended for all skill levels.
very good puzzles to improve your chess

I give this app my very highest rating because it works very smoothly, especially if you already have Analyze This (position analyzer) installed, it has a lot of variety, and I have had questions answered very quickly by a super staff. It is my favorite Chess app. It comes with 300 puzzles, but I eventually purchased more -- they offer a great deal of variety to choose from. But, my favorite thing is how it cooperates with Analyze This, so that touching a button shows exactly why a certain answer is right or wrong. I very highly recommend getting Analyze This along with this app -- it's really worth it!  :-)
That's a perfect chess puzzles for all.
I saw the puzzle 5 for normal and it's wrong! The knight can get the queen. Other then that it is a great way to practice.
replyContent:
Hello Delaney. Do you mean ♞ can capture the Queen after White plays Qh8+? That would not be allowed since the White Rook on f2 pins the Knight against its own King.
Pls email me at pereiraasim@gmail.com if its not the case.
Thanks, Asim

content: This app is well worth the money. The pay  apps are very good.  I like how the puzzles are from real games. I do think that the puzzles are a bit challenging. You can't go wrong with buying ichess  pro. Great job!
Some of the solutions don't make sense

userName: When can I go to Phobos Roblés
content: If only I could change the style of the characters? Fantastic puzzles though.

I've tried various puzzles but find I keep coming back to iChess. The options to get further puzzles and some specifically themed adds to its longevity. I generally don't play chess but enjoy chess puzzles. IChess offered a better chess puzzles experience than the puzzles included with Shredder.
Good series of  graded chess problems.
Google play games support or cloud sync for progress backup
Just amazing!
Very good
Great from mr.asim!i enjoy very much

One of the very best android apps. Peerless. Never goes wrong. On the one occasion I had a problem (caused by my own ineptness) Asim replied immediately and guided me through a resolution. A good all round guy. Has also said he intends to have tactical downloads for forks, discovered checks, etc. in the future. Can't wait. Very glad to have the opportunity of supporting Asim and this wonderful app by downloading some of the additional downloads. I especially like the mate in 1, 2, 3 & 4 moves.
Why the 'get more puzzle' is not connected anyway
replyContent:
Hello Bernard,
thanks for your feedback. Sorry about the problem with the 'Get more puzzles'. There was an unexpected change with the Server and I had to make some changes to the App as well. With the latest App update (yest), you should be able to access Get More Puzzles screen.
Please let me know how it goes (pereiraasim@gmail.com)
Thanks, Asim

content: It would be great to see what the opponent his last move was before we have to come up with the best move as often the last move changes the position that help us find a good move. Otherwise great app!

Hello Yannick,
Thanks for your feedback. Yes I plan to add support for showing the previous move or even the complete game.
Will try my best to do it at the earliest.

Really nice app, I rediscovered that chess could be fun thanks to those puzzles. Any chance to see a "Mate in 2, vol.2" soon? Keep up the good work.
I use this app from the very release and I never droped it still. "Master" difficulty is easier than Normal for me, lol.
Excellent partnered with "analyse this"

content: It is the only puzzles game I play everyday. The monthly puzzles release fresh your mind with the latest games.
Love It

I am going to start off by saying that I don't like playing chess but .... I do like doing short puzzles. So this is ideal. The best interface I have seen yet and that includes programs like Shredder that include a puzzle option. Only one gripe and it may be my phone, which is why I've not marked down the rating; that is that when I try to purchase more puzzles the app crashes.
iChess is my favorite chess app.. Works great with .pgn files

This is a great chess tutor for an intermediate/beginner like me. It links to the analyser to let me see why i got the wrong answer. I've learned a huge amount since I started using it and the other apps this genius has written. I only wish I could copy my progresses from the free version.
Nice app. Looks good and does its job perfectly.
Really great puzzles and tour through the history of chess when used with the Magic of Tal
Combined with the free analysis module it's a great way to practice your tactical skills
Great app

There are good concepts in and DLC for the program. What I reported on showing ads now and then was indeed because of me calling the free Analyze program from within the app. Thanks to the dev for answering this question. However, the paid version loses the score occasionally (will try to find out when).
replyContent:
Sorry about the problems.
iChess Paid will never show any Ads.
In case you use Analyze This app and return back to iChess, then the FREE version of Analyze This app may occasionally show a Ad ("would you like to try some more apps etc").

I would be glad to help further : pereiraasim@gmail.com

Cheers, Asim

content: ...and many, many thanks for your free world championship apps too.

Just one suggestion that could be very easily implemented...  How about a settings where we can see the board from the point of view of the victim / receiver of the moves?  I mean it's just automatically flipping the board from the other side's perspective instead of your own...  This can greatly improve defensive skills IMHO by seeing and anticipating what kind of moves can be played against you...  What do you think?  Thanks in advance and great job so far!

I just solved five problems correctly and quickly. As a result my score went down from 90 to 87%. With the correction of some very simple calculation errors this could be a great app. The concept is certainly excellent.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. iChess is not very strict with the score and timings. The aim is to practice as much as one can. Hence you can simply "Reset" the score from the scorecard and make a fresh start! No rating pressure either! I would love to hear your suggestions to improve the app = pereiraasim@gmail.com

content: No more needs to be said.
Love it! Loads quickly and having situations from actual games is cool!
Excellent.
If only there were comments and annotations per move...
replyContent: Good idea! I did annotate some Paid puzzle sets like May-Apr2013, Endgame Tactics, but its time consuming. Will try and add more. Thx Asim

content: Good puzzles. Fun to practice with.
Very handy :-)
Great app. PGN import allowed import of my Encyclopedia of Chess Middlegames database so that I can access it wherever I have my phone or tablet. Only thing missing is a rating system.
One of my favourites
Tactics of various levels, extras when you have exhausted those supplied.
I like the choice in difficulty.
I use it every day to stay sharp.
Good puzzles. Easy to use.
Well worth app
Superb app !!!
Best mobile chess app out there as long as blitz is not what you are looking for.

Sometimes I feel like some of the answers are less intuitive than others - but that's just my playing level speaking in all honesty. Overall it's an great and expandable collection of puzzles, topped off with its integration into the author's equally brilliant Analyze This analysis app. Great work Asim!
Thank you keep it up.
Why does the app need to read my phone identity? Great puzzles. Very nice app.  Few minor bugs but this is really minor. When I finish this pack of problems I will most likely buy more.
replyContent: Hello, phone identity is used to read a unique 128 digit number which is used to secure the In App purchases. Rest assured no private information is read (since those need more permissions like Accounts, Contacts, Calls).

content: Some  puzzles are not logical.
replyContent: I would be glad to fix them! Could you pls mail me such puzzle numbers (and puzzle file) to pereiraasim@gmail.com

content: Best chess tactics practice app I've ever seen.  I use it every day.
It is fun to solve it.

Truly an indispensable app for chess players wishing to improve. By far one of the best chess apps for players of all levels. Intuitive and simple to use, the app provides tactical problems from real games and includes statistical information about your progress.
Puzzles are challenging
Решение некоторых задач прописано не до конца. Комментариев к решениям нет. В общем, выброшенные деньги.
replyContent:
Hello,

Sorry about the bad experience.
Some puzzles simply win a piece or a pawn and not all end in checkmate.
These puzzles are from real games and some players choose to resign early!

I would like your suggestions to improve the app. Could you please mail me at pereiraasim@gmail.com ?

content: As a chess learning tool,  this suite is incredible.  I'm learning a lot about chess strategy!  It would be nice if some of the additional content were free after buying the ad-free version, but there are many PGN resources freely available off the web.

Perfect for me.. Master puzzles will of course be unsolvable for me... But I have earned 60 percent of the 'normal' points. I have seen some basic patterns within the puzzles which will certainly be fun to incorporate into my game.

This is an incredible study aid.   Just loaded pgn of polar lazlo 5334 problems and alburts 300 most important positions and the implementation is fantastic!! ... For both single move and multiple move problems. Can pop it out into analyse this anytime to study and let computer help...because you can add any of your own problem sets through pgn file it is a serious study tool that fills a niche that nothing else does  Might want to add "replay this problem" option  to menu...and maybe increase size of forward/back buttons on tablet...but these are minor.  This an elegant and highly useful app for any serious chess student
Good app all around.
Well designed and easy to deeply analyse positions. Thanks!
Simple. Clean. Fast. Nice work!
Simple interface, but even the basic challenges are pretty tough for me :(
No fuss chess puzzles. Love this app. Keep up the good work.
great app
Great email support. Still needs improvement. Doesn't detect all illegal moves.
Great training method
Nothing missing for chess puzzles
Should be a way to reset puzzles solved to zero , but its a great training tool for serious players.
I really love solving these puzzles. Easy to use, hard to solve.10 stars If I could.
Like it a lot. Best of its kind. Excellent interface. Great puzzles. Look forward to new content release. I will definitely buy new content release.
Nice
Yes I do.
Amazing app, very well made. Good work, developer!
